mapper.select: SELECT LOCAL_SEQ, LOCAL_NAME FROM skysearch.ss_local ORDER BY LOCAL_SEQ DESC;

select il.local_seq as LOCAL_SEQ , ll.local_name as LOCAL_NAME , il.member_SEQ as MEMBER_SEQ from skysearch.ss_int_local il INNER JOIN skysearch.ss_local ll ON il.local_seq = ll.local_seq
and il.MEMBER_SEQ = #{MEMBER_SEQ}
